item.author: Chuckanucka
item.title: The ultimate xml news file
item.description: This file has been designed to be very easy to update, customised and understand. There is a huge configuation section which lets you control a large array of settings, allowing you to make changes without knowing any actionscript at all! The code is very well commented making this file an excellent learning resource.

item.author: Kylie
item.title: Automatic thumbnails
item.description: One of the smartest features of this file is its ablity to generate thumbnails. All you have to do is supply the large image and a thumbnail is produced at runtime, according to the size you set in the configuation section. No more hours spent resizing images in photoshop ! All images have super slick preloaders and fade in on load.

item.author: John
item.title: Intelligent scrollbar
item.description: Another nice feature is the intelligent scrollbar system. Hidden unless needed the slick scroll bar automatically resizes depending on the size of your news blog. There are settings to easily change the speed, easing and color of the scrollbar. item.author: Kylie
item.title: HTML and CSS suppport
item.description: HTML and CSS are setup for the main description text. Tags such as bold as well as hyperlinks can be included in the XML and formatted by using the external stylesheet.

item.author: Steve
item.title: Short descriptions
item.description: When your description is shorter than your maximuim character count the read more link is removed (this can be turned off).

item.author: Bob
item.title: Clean and clear code
item.description: A lot of effort has gone into ensuring this file is easy to use and understand. The code is very well commented and the layers and library are clearly labled and organised.

item.author: Kylie
item.title: Easy to update
item.description: Everything is driven via XML so the file is very easy to update and maintain. The automatic summaires and thumbnails make it even quicker to get your news out there.

item.author: John
item.title: 100% resizable
item.description: A really nice feature of this file is it has been designed in such as way that it will automatically resize and algin if you modify the size of its components. This makes adding your own personal touches much easier.
